                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E202%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#山东新增202例确诊病例#</a> 累计确诊748例】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 2月20日12-24时，山东省报告新增新型冠状病毒肺炎确诊病例202例(含山东省任城监狱200例)，累计确诊病例748例(含重症病例7例，危重症病例13例，治愈出院270例，死亡病例4例);新增疑似病例12例，现有疑似病例30例。截至目前，追踪到密切接 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvckhrqXQ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474355536538510:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474355536538510&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#青海新冠肺炎确诊患者清零#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/36/2018new_geili_org.png" title="[给力]" alt="[给力]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月21日10时20分，青海省最后2例新冠肺炎病例从青海省第四人民医院出院 。至此，青海收住在青海省第四人民医院的15例确诊病例全部出院，加之前期收住在西宁市第三人民医院已经出院的3例确诊病例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B718%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#青海18例确诊病例全部出院#</a>。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B7%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网青海频道">@人民网青海频道</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvcbjnjPZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474349975557803:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474349975557803&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474349463359753" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivcaue61z?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 10:18" date="1582251504000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474349463359753:fromprofile"> 2月21日 10:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【解读：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%E8%A4%92%E6%89%AC%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%81%9A%23&amp;from=default">#疫情防控牺牲人员烈士褒扬工作如何做#</a>？】近日，退役军人事务部、中央军委政治工作部联合印发通知，要求妥善做好因疫情防控牺牲人员烈士褒扬工作。印发的《通知》考量因素有哪些？烈士评定有何标准及执行方案？退役军人事务部相关负责人20日接受人民网专访，围绕这些问题进行了解读。戳↓ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivcaue61z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474349463359753:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474349463359753&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6005932375&amp;cid=4474348587067497&amp;nick=小何小何-满目星河&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4474343281363076" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivc0w5IB6?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 09:53" date="1582250030000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474343281363076:fromprofile"> 2月21日 09:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E5%B0%94%E6%BB%A8%E4%B8%A4%E5%8C%BA%E5%8E%BF%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%8D%E5%8A%9B%E8%A2%AB%E5%85%8D%E8%81%8C%23&amp;from=default">#哈尔滨两区县领导防控不力被免职#</a>】据哈尔滨市纪委监委，香坊区委副书记、区长赵罡，五常市委副书记、市长于军，在应对疫情工作特殊时期，对疫情严峻形势估计不足，对疫情防控领导不力，组织发动不够，防控措施不实，造成香坊区、五常市疫情扩散。经市委常委会会议研究决定，免去赵罡香坊区委副书记 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivc0w5IB6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474343281363076:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474343281363076&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474341003628643" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvbWQfdYv?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 09:44" date="1582249487000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474341003628643:fromprofile"> 2月21日 09:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E8%A5%BF%E4%B8%80%E6%9E%9C%E5%86%9C%E5%90%91%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%8D%9016%E5%90%A8%E7%A0%82%E7%B3%96%E6%A9%98%23&amp;from=default">#广西一果农向武汉捐16吨砂糖橘#</a>给一线医护和公安干警】2月20日，广西柳州融安县长安镇珠玉村果农叶玉华将自家果园里16吨价值11.6万元砂糖橘，通过广西宁波商会捐赠渠道，专车运送到湖北武汉，送给战斗在抗击新冠肺炎一线的医护人员和公安干警等。（中新网）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hHWdbs" alt="http://t.cn/A6hHWdbs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E6%89%B9%E8%BE%BE%E6%A0%87%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%E4%B8%8B%E8%88%B9%23&amp;from=default">#钻石公主号最后一批达标乘客下船#</a>】“钻石公主”号最后一批符合“核酸测试阴性、未密切接触感染者”标准的乘客，今天将下船。核酸阴性的密接乘客将继续隔离。共载3711人的“钻石公主”号之前有约1900人下船，目前，船上确诊人数达634名。人民网联动<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%A2%A8%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=梨视频">@梨视频</a> 现场直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474337580817779:1034-video:1034%3A4476560808280091:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474337580817779:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hHpkEt" alt="http://t.cn/A6hHpkEt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=7321902178&amp;cid=4474338110041644&amp;nick=溏米的左耳朵&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 09:33</div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/IvbOV76lq&amp;mid=4474336091692688&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gc3rjej3d0j20go0rstcr" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>143</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                                                                                            <li>

        </div>
    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474334938823079" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvbN3B1hJ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 09:20" date="1582248041000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474334938823079:fromprofile"> 2月21日 09:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

            </div>
        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4474328785860404" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvbD8oAyE?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 08:56" date="1582246574000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474328785860404:fromprofile"> 2月21日 08:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%E5%A9%9A%E7%A4%BC%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8D%E5%B9%B8%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#医生推迟婚礼上一线不幸感染去世#</a> <img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】因感染新冠肺炎，武汉年仅29岁的医生彭银华昨天离世。彭银华原定正月初八举行婚礼，因疫情来袭他推迟了婚礼走上“战疫”一线。有同事曾让他回家休息，但他说“我年轻，我顶上！”正月初一这一天，彭银华倒下了。躺在他办公桌抽屉里的结婚请柬，如今再也无法 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvbD8oAyE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474328785860404:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474328785860404&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474326822516408" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvbzYayDe?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 08:48" date="1582246105000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474326822516408:fromprofile"> 2月21日 08:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%B1%85%E6%B0%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%97%E5%BC%BA%E5%88%B6%E6%A3%80%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#钻石公主号首批香港居民接受强制检疫#</a>】2月20日上午，“钻石公主”号邮轮上的首批106位香港居民乘包机抵达香港国际机场，随后乘旅游巴士抵达骏洋邨，接受为期14天的强制检疫。当局表示，医护和警员会24小时驻守，不容许受检疫人士擅自离开，出现病征者会送往医院。（中新网）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hHXo4t" alt="http://t.cn/A6hHXo4t" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民日报钟声：以邻为壑换不来独善其身】<a title="以邻为壑换不来独善其身（钟声）" href="http://t.cn/A6hHJnFA" alt="http://t.cn/A6hHJnFA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>以邻为壑换不来独善其身（钟声）</a> 疫情发生后，世界卫生组织多次表示不建议各国采取任何旅行或贸易限制措施。然而，仍有一些国家无视世卫组织专业权威建议，采取断航等过度甚至极端限制措施。全球化时代，各国利益交融、命运相连。应对突发公共卫生事件，慌不得，乱不得 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivbt9iAg3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474322594429283:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474322594429283&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

         		                            </li>

                                <a name="4474320937627105" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivbqtw09P?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 08:25" date="1582244703000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474320937627105:fromprofile"> 2月21日 08:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%AE%AD%E6%96%A5%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E8%A2%AB%E5%81%9C%E8%81%8C%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉训斥医护人员患者被停职检查#</a>【湖北省市场监管局党组决定：对朱保华停职检查】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=长江日报">@长江日报</a> ，2月20日晚，网传武汉市第七医院患者无端训斥医护人员的视频。湖北省市场监管局在核实该患者为该局后勤服务中心筹备组副组长朱保华后，连夜召开党组会，一致认为：在这场事关人民生命 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivbqtw09P" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474320937627105:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474320937627105&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%89%93%E7%90%86%E5%A4%B4%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#疫情期如何打理头发#</a>？<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/a1/2018new_doge02_org.png" title="[doge]" alt="[doge]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】受疫情影响，很多理发店还未复工，“无处安放”的秀发成了困扰大家的问题。有网友哭诉，2019年最后悔的事就是年末没去理发。还有的网友干脆放弃治疗，准备留个披肩发，做一次艺术家。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a>，疫情期间，你如何打理头发？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474313874803275:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_287815_-_680387" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_287815_-_680387" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_287815_-_680387" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!--文字投票-->

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 07:22</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A728%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#日本累计确诊728例新冠肺炎#</a>，死亡3例】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>，据日本广播协会电视台综合日本厚生劳动省和各地方政府的消息，截至当地时间2月20日23时，日本国内累计确诊新冠肺炎病例728例，死亡3例。<br>其中，“钻石公主”号邮轮上共确诊634例，在日本国内的日本人和中国游客等共80例，从武汉乘坐包机 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvaWyqtFY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474302386310606:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474302386310606&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4474186418664294&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2630570525&amp;commentmid=4474186330479255" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>8</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月20日 23:30</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

        <ul class="clearfix">

                        <li><span class="line S_line1"><a bpfilter="page_frame" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv3HLpHe4" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=feed_trans_weibo&amp;value=comment:4474024136124364"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em> 516</em></span></a></span></li>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4474177543654888" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv7HcfkNO?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 22:55" date="1582210514000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474177543654888:fromprofile"> 2月20日 22:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%AA%A8%E7%A7%91%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E6%89%8B%E7%BB%98%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E8%B6%85%E8%83%BD%E6%88%98%E5%8F%8B%23&amp;from=default">#骨科医生手绘我的超能战友#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】叶志伟是武汉市第四医院古田院区一名骨科医生，该院是武汉市首批新冠肺炎定点医院之一，他也是第一批奔赴一线的医生。近日，叶志伟将战友们工作的身影与他热爱的动漫形象结合，手绘“群英谱”，反映一线工作者的乐观态度，为战友鼓劲。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网湖北频道">@人民网湖北频道</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv7HcfkNO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474177543654888:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474177543654888&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【实用！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8A%9E%E5%85%AC%E5%BF%85%E5%A4%87App%23&amp;from=default">#云办公必备App#</a>】①WPS OFFICE：可以在手机端修改各种文档，甚至解压文件；②扫描全能王：将手机变成扫描仪，学生党和上班族都适用；③XMind思维导图：帮你梳理和延伸思路绪，头脑风暴的最佳工具之一；④石墨文档：支持多人同时操作修改同一个文档，会议记录非常方便…你还有哪些推荐？<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/42/2018new_guolai_org.png" title="[来]" alt="[来]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_text">
                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6051413116" usercard="id=6051413116">曾经的那一抹似水柔情</a>：妹妹，一起吃糖哦。                    </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=5789880547&amp;screen_name=司马徽音" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 01:37</div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474171335845436" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv7xbowFe?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 22:30" date="1582209035000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474171335845436:fromprofile"> 2月20日 22:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%84%BF%E5%AD%90%E5%8D%96%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%AF%88%E9%AA%97%E6%AF%8D%E4%BA%B2%E5%B8%A6%E5%85%B6%E8%87%AA%E9%A6%96%23&amp;from=default">#儿子卖口罩诈骗母亲带其自首#</a>】近日，广东佛山，男子以出售口罩为名网上诈骗数十万元，母亲带着他到派出所自首。儿子被民警带走后，母亲转身跪地痛哭。民警称这位母亲为儿子的事，气得每晚都睡不着觉，心里觉得过意不去，便带儿子来自首。网友：可怜天下父母心。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=时间视频">@时间视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474171335845436:1034-video:1034%3A4474095241199641:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474171335845436:2286908003" title="时间视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hjBhzg" alt="http://t.cn/A6hjBhzg" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>时间视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5316439517" usercard="id=5316439517">百鬼夜行45</a>：微博上太多孩子犯罪就怪父母的！没错！父母的教育是很重要。从这篇文章来看，这对父母的教育无疑是成功的。只是儿子自己走了歪路。但父母不能背全部的锅！我就不信在座的各位长这么大都没做过一两件错事的。难道因为这个我也可以堂而皇之地骂你们父母吗？！！？                    </div>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326835&amp;ssig=mbDltByScW" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474168148011905" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv7s2xCgh?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 22:17" date="1582208275000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474168148011905:fromprofile"> 2月20日 22:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【遇到这些面试题，你知道怎么答吗？】①为什么选择我们公司：事先做好功课，可从企业文化、公司有吸引力的项目入手；②对薪资的要求是多少：首先表达对工作的热爱，其次初入职场要求不高，最后相信公司不会亏待；③缺乏经验如何胜任：有较强的责任心、适应能力和学习能力，可以弥补。                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4473937196824047" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【实用帖！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E9%9D%A2%E8%AF%95%E8%A6%81%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%23&amp;from=default">#视频面试要注意什么#</a>？】疫情期间会耽误毕业生求职吗？人社部<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BC%93%E5%8A%B1%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E9%9D%A2%E8%AF%95%E7%AD%BE%E7%BA%A6%E6%8A%A5%E5%88%B0%23&amp;from=default">#鼓励网上面试签约报到#</a>，引导用人单位适当延长招聘时间，推迟体检，推迟签约录取。那么，视频面试要注意什么？形象、灯光、背景、设备、肢体、节奏一个都不能少！有经验的小伙伴评论分享吧___ ​​​​                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474167120787294" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv7qo3iOi?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 22:13" date="1582208029000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474167120787294:fromprofile"> 2月20日 22:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E5%95%86%E5%93%81%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E6%91%98%E6%8E%89%E9%97%A8%E5%B8%98%23&amp;from=default">#北京建议商品市场摘掉门帘#</a> 尽量避免乘厢式电梯】2月20日，北京市商务局制定和发布了商品交易市场、批发市场、商超配送物流、加油站、美发美容等5个领域疫情防控指引。指引中建议上述场所摘掉门帘；尽量避免乘坐厢式电梯；加油不下车，开票不进店，购物不接触。（新京报）<a title="北京建议商品市场等场所摘掉门帘，尽量避免乘..." href="http://t.cn/A6hYm8DG" alt="http://t.cn/A6hYm8DG" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>北京建议商品市场等场所摘掉门帘，尽量避免乘...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/Iv7qo3iOi&amp;mid=4474167120787294&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc383vp39vj20dw0bkabc" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>68</em></span></span></span></a>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【多省公布考研成绩 来报一下你的分数段吧？】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E6%88%90%E7%BB%A9%23&amp;from=default">#浙江考研成绩#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E6%88%90%E7%BB%A9%23&amp;from=default">#广东考研成绩#</a> 2020年考研成绩陆续公布了，各位小伙伴们还好吗？考研党们一起来分享一下现在的心情如何？大声报出你的分数段吧！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474163924171853:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_286908_-_a5b0db" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_286908_-_a5b0db" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_286908_-_a5b0db" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="vote_tit">多省公布考研成绩 来报一下你的分数段吧？</div>
    <!--文字投票-->
            <!--投票已经结束，或者已经参与投票-->
                    <div class="vote_con1">
                                    <div class="item_rt clearfix S_line1 S_bg2 S_txt2" action-data="vote_id=2020_286908_-_a5b0db&amp;vote_items=975749&amp;mid=4474163924171853&amp;is_forward=0&amp;vote_action_data_rt=allowForward%3D1%26url%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fweibo.com%2F2286908003%2FIv7lehvhX%26mid%3D4474163924171853%26name%3D%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%26uid%3D2286908003%26domain%3Drenminwang&amp;vote_state=0">
                        <div class="bg S_bg1" style="width: 28%;"></div>
                        <div class="W_fl">400分以上，这层不属于我</div>
                        <div class="W_fr">9410人</div>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="item_rt clearfix S_line1 S_bg2 S_txt2" action-data="vote_id=2020_286908_-_a5b0db&amp;vote_items=975750&amp;mid=4474163924171853&amp;is_forward=0&amp;vote_action_data_rt=allowForward%3D1%26url%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fweibo.com%2F2286908003%2FIv7lehvhX%26mid%3D4474163924171853%26name%3D%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%26uid%3D2286908003%26domain%3Drenminwang&amp;vote_state=0">
                        <div class="bg S_bg1" style="width: 25%;"></div>
                        <div class="W_fl">400-360分，这层基本有戏</div>
                        <div class="W_fr">8258人</div>
                    </div>

                        <div class="bg S_bg1" style="width: 24%;"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474156790144524" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv79J0BB2?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 21:32" date="1582205566000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474156790144524:fromprofile"> 2月20日 21:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【来自热带的爱！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%B7%E5%8D%97152%E5%90%A8%E6%9E%9C%E8%94%AC%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#海南152吨果蔬出发#</a> 目的地湖北！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月20日17时，一趟装载着152吨果蔬的铁路列车从海南三亚崖州站驶向湖北。这批物资是由海南多家爱心企业捐赠，通过铁路冷链专列发往武汉市、荆州市、随州市、孝感市，用于抗击疫情一线医护人员的后勤保障。（央视）<a title="海南首趟援鄂果蔬铁路专列出发" href="http://t.cn/A6hYjabp" alt="http://t.cn/A6hYjabp" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>海南首趟援鄂果蔬铁路专列出发</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474153354373919" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv74bilR5?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 21:19" date="1582204748000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474153354373919:fromprofile"> 2月20日 21:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%95%91%E5%8A%A9%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A%E5%9B%B0%E9%9A%BE%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%23&amp;from=default">#湖北要求救助特殊困难群体#</a>】20日，湖北省新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情防控指挥部发出通知，要求对低保对象、特困人员、重度残疾人、孤儿、留守老人、留守儿童等特殊困难群体，按照城市人员不低于500元、农村人员不低于300元的标准，给予生活物资救助。分配捐赠的生活物资时，应优先考虑特殊困难群体和 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv74bilR5" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474153354373919:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474153354373919&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474151073342814" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv70ve1Cm?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 21:10" date="1582204204000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474151073342814:fromprofile"> 2月20日 21:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%B4%E7%99%BE%23&amp;from=default">#方舱医院单日出院人数破百#</a> 共123人出院创纪录】2月20日，由武汉协和医院接管运营的江汉方舱医院传来利好消息，连日来不断攀升的出院人数在今日破百，达到123人。江汉方舱成为武汉市现有方舱中首个单日出院人数破百的医院。（人民日报）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hjshbm" alt="http://t.cn/A6hjshbm" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%AC%E9%A9%AC%E6%8B%89%E6%9D%BE%E5%90%91%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%B7%91%E8%80%85%E8%87%B4%E6%AD%89%23&amp;from=default">#东京马拉松向中国跑者致歉#</a>】20日，东京马拉松组委会向居住在中国并且原定参加东京马拉松2020的跑者发布致歉信，组委会表示，14日所发布的公告是考虑到疫情的影响，希望居住在中国的跑者能够自愿放弃比赛，才决定可以将名额延续到2021年并免除报名费。但在此后的两三天内，日本国内的确诊人数突然增 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv6WBsawc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474148656713620:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474148656713620&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=7012784979&amp;cid=4474149252778010&amp;nick=月球新人酒粥壹桶II&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%90%8E%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E8%87%AA%E6%84%88%E5%90%8E%E6%8D%90%E7%8C%AE%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%23&amp;from=default">#95后护士自愈后捐献血浆#</a>【武汉日记：“OK？我那是300毫升！”】贾娜是武汉市人民医院的一名护士。19日，已经“自愈”的贾娜前往献血站捐献血浆。在被问到为何对着门口比OK手势时？贾娜笑着说：OK？我那是300毫升！我想献400毫升的，工作人员怕我吃不消。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474144806730990:1022-article:1022%3A2309354474144820429093:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474144806730990:2286908003" title="武汉日记：“OK？我那是300毫升！”" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474144820429093" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474144820429093" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>武汉日记：“OK？我那是300毫升！”</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/Iv6Qosf2m&amp;mid=4474144806730990&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gc35jmhnakj20fa08l3yz" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>79</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【会玩儿！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BD%91%E5%8F%8B%E8%87%AA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E9%A5%BC%23&amp;from=default">#网友自制口罩饼#</a> 不抗病毒但抗饿<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/83/2018new_kuxiao_org.png" title="[允悲]" alt="[允悲]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#隔离日记#</a> 口罩买不到，整个口罩饼！虽不可外用但内服效果极佳。往后看，那个汤，绝了<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/75/2018new_gui_org.png" title="[跪了]" alt="[跪了]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（生活晨报）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474140058339450:1034-video:1034%3A4474130813091865:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474140058339450:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hY68Iw" alt="http://t.cn/A6hY68Iw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4474137806816398" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv6F6sBfU?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 20:17" date="1582201041000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474137806816398:fromprofile"> 2月20日 20:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【特殊案例！一<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E7%97%B0%E5%92%BD%E6%8B%AD%E5%AD%90%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E9%98%B4%E6%80%A7%E7%B2%AA%E4%BE%BF%E9%98%B3%E6%80%A7%23&amp;from=default">#男子痰咽拭子检测阴性粪便阳性#</a> 】据浙江舟山市卫健委20日通报，2月16日晚，戚某某粪便标本新冠病毒检测阳性，痰咽拭子检测阴性，无临床表现，根据新冠肺炎诊疗方案，不符合疑似病例和确诊病例诊断标准。为降低可能传染的风险，将其由救护车送至定点医院隔离治疗。2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv6F6sBfU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474137806816398:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474137806816398&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月20日 20:18</div>

                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iv6q0Aklf&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326843&amp;ssig=eyNAHRkvpq" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474128448658005" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv6q0Aklf?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 19:40" date="1582198809000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474128448658005:fromprofile"> 2月20日 19:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%A9%E4%B8%9A%E7%BB%8F%E7%90%86%E5%BE%92%E6%89%8B%E7%88%AC10%E6%A5%BC%E7%81%AD%E7%81%AB%23&amp;from=default">#物业经理徒手爬10楼灭火#</a>：很后怕，千万不要模仿】18日，江苏溧阳一居民区10楼阳台着火，当时住户家中无人，物业经理苏治强想尽各种方法之后，徒手从9楼阳台爬上10楼灭火，成功阻止了火势蔓延。苏治强称事后想起来很害怕，希望大家不要模仿他的行为。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A9%BA%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%23&amp;from=default">#隔空守护#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=时间视频">@时间视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474128448658005:1034-video:1034%3A4474048411795463:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474128448658005:2286908003" title="时间视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hjIBwu" alt="http://t.cn/A6hjIBwu" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>时间视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2395%E5%B2%81%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%8E%E7%89%A9%E7%90%86%E7%B3%BB%E6%95%99%E6%8E%88%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E6%8E%88%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#95岁清华物理系教授直播授课#</a> 学生更愿意提问了<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月20日，95岁高龄的<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%8E%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=清华大学">@清华大学</a> 物理系张礼教授，熟练使用网络直播进行《量子力学前沿选题》线上教学。张礼教授：这种教学方式能够很好联系学生，学生也更愿意提问了，这也太好了。网友：上学时缺个这样的物理老师！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474124669960859:1034-video:1034%3A4474128581984264:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474124669960859:2286908003" title="清华大学的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hYcurh" alt="http://t.cn/A6hYcurh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>清华大学的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【55秒破两亿，小米新机首销火爆激活行业】据小米官方最新数据，小米10 Pro首卖仅55秒，全平台销售额就已突破2亿元。作为疫情发生后的首场旗舰发布会，手机业率先被激活。受大环境影响， 消费者的消费热情被极大削减。小米10系列能够冲破阴霾，在大幅提升起售价的前提下取得如此亮眼的首销成绩，足见消 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv6cav3UY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474119867403232:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474119867403232&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4474117124528069&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=99" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>
                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iv67KiZXn&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326843&amp;ssig=eyNAHRkvpq" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474117124528069" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv67KiZXn?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 18:55" date="1582196109000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474117124528069:fromprofile"> 2月20日 18:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【四川火锅协会倡议：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%8F%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E5%90%831%E5%B9%B4%E7%81%AB%E9%94%85%23&amp;from=default">#四川援武汉医护免费吃1年火锅#</a>】2月17日，四川省火锅协会倡议全体会员，为出征武汉的四川医务人员免费提供一年的火锅。据悉，已有有60家火锅品牌共400多家分店响应，目前参加的企业还在增加。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%AD%89%E4%BD%A0%E4%BB%AC%E5%9B%9E%E6%9D%A5%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E5%90%83%E4%B8%80%E5%B9%B4%E7%81%AB%E9%94%85%23&amp;from=default">#四川等你们回来免费吃一年火锅#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%BE%8E%E6%B9%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=澎湃新闻">@澎湃新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474117124528069:1034-video:1034%3A4474062676885524:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474117124528069:2286908003" title="澎湃新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hjax3k" alt="http://t.cn/A6hjax3k" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>澎湃新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=3366711520&amp;cid=4474117300038902&amp;nick=敷尔佳吖-&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609326843&amp;ssig=eyNAHRkvpq" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474113529270293" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv61WCTCR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 18:40" date="1582195252000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474113529270293:fromprofile"> 2月20日 18:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a>【你平时坐地铁如何支付？】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%E7%A5%A8%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BC%9A%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#地铁票是否会传播病毒#</a> 据中国疾控中心研究员冯录召介绍，新冠肺炎主要的传播方式仍然是以飞沫和接触传播为主，虽然循环使用的地铁票沾染病毒的概率是非常低的，还是建议用其它方式支付地铁费用。那么，你平时坐地铁都是如何支付呢？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474113529270293:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_285667_-_c878a0" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_285667_-_c878a0" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_285667_-_c878a0" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474112091150259" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv5ZD4Pez?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 18:35" date="1582194910000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474112091150259:fromprofile"> 2月20日 18:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【疫情期间<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%85%B3%E5%BF%83%E7%9A%84%E7%A4%BE%E4%BF%9D%E5%8C%BB%E4%BF%9D%E5%85%AC%E7%A7%AF%E9%87%91%23&amp;from=default">#你关心的社保医保公积金#</a>，国新办这场发布会讲透了】2月20日下午， 国新办召开新闻发布会，就企业如何缴纳社保，医保，公积金等问进行解答。①社会保险费实行免、减、缓举措。②医疗保险费实行阶段性的减半征收措施。③住房公积金提出三阶段性支持政策。详戳→<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474112091150259:1022-article:1022%3A2309354474112096469511:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474112091150259:2286908003" title="疫情期间企业如何缴纳社保、医保和公积金？国..." href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474112096469511" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474112096469511" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>疫情期间企业如何缴纳社保、医保和公积金？国...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【贴心！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23130%E4%B8%87%E5%BC%A0%E5%B0%8F%E8%93%9D%E7%A5%A8%E6%B3%A1%E6%BE%A1%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#130万张小蓝票泡澡消毒#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%E7%A5%A8%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BC%9A%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#地铁票是否会传播病毒#</a>？中国疾控中心研究员表示，地铁票沾染病毒的概率非常低。但为了确保市民用上放心安全的车票，2月19日，南宁对130万张地铁单程票进行消毒处理。消毒液中浸泡30分钟，再集中风干、清点入库。(中新网)<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hYPDN5" alt="http://t.cn/A6hYPDN5" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> 最近你坐地铁了吗 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iv5VCgsMZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474109603923917:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474109603923917&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474107695269600" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iv5Sxm6Ry?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-20 18:17" date="1582193862000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474107695269600:fromprofile"> 2月20日 18:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家体育总局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E9%98%9F%E5%85%A8%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#国家队全封闭管理#</a>】近日，国家体育总局就新冠肺炎影响中国运动员奥运备战奥运的情况进行解答。①实行国家队全封闭管理。②提前出国训练、延长国（境）外训练时间等方式，保证重点人员训练参赛不受影响。③加强与国际体育组织沟通，及时通报疫情进展。（央视）<a title="国家体育总局：有信心完成好“抗疫情、保备战”..." href="http://t.cn/A6hjss4j" alt="http://t.cn/A6hjss4j" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>国家体育总局：有信心完成好“抗疫情、保备战”...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iv5Wg98B8&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->

                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&from=default\">#青海新冠肺炎确诊患者清零#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/36\/2018new_geili_org.png\" title=\"[给力]\" alt=    \"[给力]\" type=\"face\" \/>】2月21日10时20分，青海省最后2例新冠肺炎病例从青海省第四人民医院出院 。至此，青海收住在青海省第四人民医院的15例确诊病例全部出院，加之前期收住在西宁市第三人民医院已经出院的3例确诊病例，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B718%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&from=default\">#青海18例确诊病例全部出院#<\/a>。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&from=default\">#新冠肺炎最新动态#<\/a> <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B7%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=人民网青海频道\">@人民网青海频道<\/a> ​​​​...<a                                                                                  【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%B1%85%E6%B0%91%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%97%E5%BC%BA%E5%88%B6%E6%A3%80%E7%96%AB%23&from=default\">#钻石公主号首批香港居民接受强制检疫#<\/a>】2月20日上午，“钻石公主”号邮轮上的首批106位香港居民乘包机抵达香港国际机场，随后乘旅游巴士抵达骏洋邨，接受为期14天的强制检疫。当局表示，医护和警员会24小时驻守，不容许受检疫人士擅自离开，出现病征者会送往医院。（中新网）<a                                               【人民日报钟声：以邻为壑换不来独善其身】<a  title=\"以邻为壑换不来独善其身（钟声）\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hHJnFA\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hHJnFA\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_link\">O<\/i>以邻为壑换不来独善其身（钟声）<\/a> 疫情发生后，世界卫生组织多次表示不建议各国采取任何旅行或贸易限制措施。然而，仍有一些国家无视世卫组织专业权威建议，采取断航等过度甚至极端限制措施。全球化时代，各国利益交融、命运相连。应对突发公共卫生事件，慌不得，乱不得 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/Ivbt9iAg3\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4474322594429283:2286908003\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\"
